entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story, a boy who is standing on the edge of a huge chessboard.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another main character in the story, a boy who is trying to figure out how to get across the chessboard.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a third main character in the story, a girl who is nervous about their situation.

entities.name: chessmen
entities.description: The chessmen are pieces on the chessboard that are carved from black stone and have no faces.

entities.name: knight
entities.description: A specific type of chessman that is mentioned in the story.

relationships.description: Ron puts his hand out to touch the knight's horse, causing it to spring to life.
Ron turns to Harry and asks if they have to join the chessmen to get across.
